str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To foreordain, predetermine, mark out beforehand. From pro and horizo; to limit in advance, i.e. predetermine.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I call, summon, invite, (b) I call, name. Akin to the base of keleuo; to 'call'.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From dikaios; to render just or innocent.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural

str2: From dikaios; to render just or innocent.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To glorify, honor, bestow glory on. From doxa; to render glorious.
